EmailTemplate.name: 18-Bus @ Cloud Spd-Peering Engineering-Email-EmailSeriesPeerng-T003Q5.Email 2.2
EmailTemplate.subject: When will you suffer a BGP config error?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Don’t let "fat fingers” increase your peering costs BGP misconfigurations are happening more frequently. In 2017 there were 14,000 incidents affecting 3,000 systems. Read our blog <[[http://pf.content.nokia.com/webscale-peering-hub/bring-insight-blog?lb_email={{lead.Email Address}}&did=d000000001ee&utm_campaign=peering_engineering&utm_source=email-list-marketo-webscale&utm_medium=email&utm_content=bringing-insight-blog&utm_term=peering-follow-up]]> to find out how automated peering engineering helps eliminate costly BGP config errors. © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
